name: AVSynchronizedLayer
desc: A Core Animation layer that derives its timing from a player item so that you can synchronize layer animations with media playback.

items.name: init(playerItem: AVPlayerItem)
items.desc: Creates a new synchronized layer with timing synchronized with a given player item.

items.name: var playerItem: AVPlayerItem?
items.desc: The player item to which the timing of the layer is synchronized.

items.name: let AVCoreAnimationBeginTimeAtZero: CFTimeInterval
items.desc: A value that sets an animation begin time to 0.
